Activity: Check emails and company communication channels. Review any feedback on the refined blockout models.
Select one or two blockout models to focus on for high-poly sculpting. Choose assets that are representative of the game's environment and style.
Begin sculpting the high-poly models in Blender. Add intricate details and surface imperfections. Focus on creating a visually appealing and realistic look.
Continue sculpting the high-poly models. Pay attention to the overall form and ensure that the details are consistent throughout the asset.
Take a break from sculpting and experiment with different texturing techniques in Substance Painter. Research PBR workflows and learn how to create realistic materials.
Continue exploring texturing techniques and apply them to the high-poly models. This will help visualize the final look of the assets.
